<!-- ABOUT THE PROJECT -->
## About The Project

A simple snake game made in Godot engine v3.5.

![screenshot]

## Features

* 20x20 playing board
* game starts with a snake of size 3
* fruit position is randomly generated
* snake grows in size upon eating fruit
* new fruit is generated
* game is over when snake bites itself or leaves the playable area
* tracking and displaying current score and high score

### Built With

[![Godot](https://img.shields.io/badge/Godot-20232A?style=for-the-badge&logoColor=FFFFFF&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://godotengine.org/)

This project has been realized in Godot v3.5 game engine.
Code is written in GDScript language.

<p align="right">(<a href="#readme-top">back to top</a>)</p>
